00025    using namespace Util;

00028    BlockRadiusGyration::BlockRadiusGyration(System& system) 
00029     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00030       outputFile_(),
00031       accumulators_(),
00032       positions_(),
00033       rCom_(),
00034       iTypeNAtom_(),
00035       speciesPtr_(0),
00036       nAtomType_(-1),
00037       nAtomTypePairs_(-1),
00038       nSamplePerBlock_(-1),
00039       speciesId_(-1),
00040       nAtom_(-1),
00041       isInitialized_(false)
00042    {}
00043 
00045    void BlockRadiusGyration::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00046    {
00047       readInterval(in);
00048       readOutputFileName(in);
00049       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00050       nAtomTypePairs_ = 0;
00051       int i, j;
00052       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00053          for (j = i+1; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00054             ++nAtomTypePairs_;
00055          } 
00056       } 
00057       accumulators_.allocate(nAtomType_ + nAtomTypePairs_);
00058       
00059       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00060       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_+nAtomTypePairs_; ++i) {
00061          accumulators_[i].setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00062       }
00063      
00064       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00065       if (accumulators_[0].nSamplePerBlock()) {
00066          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00067       }
00068 
00069       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00070       if (speciesId_ < 0) {
00071          UTIL_THROW("Negative speciesId");
00072       }
00073 
00074       if (speciesId_ >= system().simulation().nSpecies()) {
00075          UTIL_THROW("speciesId > nSpecies");
00076       }
00077 
00078       speciesPtr_ = &system().simulation().species(speciesId_);
00079       nAtom_ = speciesPtr_->nAtom();
00080 
00081       // Allocate an array of separation Vectors
00082       positions_.allocate(nAtom_); 
00083       
00084       // Allocate an array of center of mass position vectors
00085       rCom_.allocate(nAtomType_); 
00086       
00087       // Allocate an array of number of atoms in blocks of different types
00088       iTypeNAtom_.allocate(nAtomType_); 
00089 
00090       isInitialized_ = true;
00091    }
00092 
00093    /*
00094    * Clear accumulators.
00095    */
00096    void BlockRadiusGyration::setup() 
00097    {  
00098       if (!isInitialized_) UTIL_THROW("Object is not initialized");
00099 
00100       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType_ + nAtomTypePairs_; ++i) {
00101          accumulators_[i].clear(); 
00102       }
00103    }
00104 
00105    /* 
00106    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00107    */
00108    void BlockRadiusGyration::sample(long iStep) 
00109    { 
00110       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00111 
00112          Molecule* moleculePtr;
00113          Vector    r1, r2, dR;
00114          DArray<double> dRSq;      //to store dRSq of different atomTypes
00115          DArray<double> dRSqPair;  //to store dRSq of different atomTypePairs
00116          int       i, j, k, l, m, typeId, nMolecule;
00117 
00118          dRSq.allocate(nAtomType_);
00119          dRSqPair.allocate(nAtomTypePairs_);
00120          k = 0;
00121          for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00122             dRSq[i] = 0.0;
00123             iTypeNAtom_[i] = 0;
00124             for (j = i+1; j < nAtomType_; ++j) { 
00125                ++k;
00126                dRSqPair[k-1] = 0.0;
00127             }
00128          }
00129 
00130          nMolecule = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00131          moleculePtr = &system().molecule(speciesId_,0);
00132          for (j = 0 ; j < nAtom_; j++) {
00133             typeId = moleculePtr->atom(j).typeId(); 
00134             iTypeNAtom_[typeId] += 1;
00135          }
00136  
00137          for (i = 0; i < system().nMolecule(speciesId_); i++) {
00138             moleculePtr = &system().molecule(speciesId_, i);
00139 
00140             //Initializing the center of mass positions for different block types to be zero
00141             for (j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00142                rCom_[j].zero();
00143             }
00144 
00145             // Construct map of molecule with no periodic boundary conditions
00146             positions_[0] = moleculePtr->atom(0).position();
00147             typeId = moleculePtr->atom(0).typeId();
00148             rCom_[typeId] += positions_[0];
00149             for (j = 1 ; j < nAtom_; j++) {
00150                typeId = moleculePtr->atom(j).typeId(); 
00151                r1 = moleculePtr->atom(j-1).position();
00152                r2 = moleculePtr->atom(j).position();
00153                system().boundary().distanceSq(r1, r2, dR);
00154                positions_[j]  = positions_[j-1];
00155                positions_[j] += dR;
00156                rCom_[typeId] += positions_[j];
00157             }
00158             for (l = 0; l < nAtomType_; ++l) {
00159                rCom_[l] /= double(iTypeNAtom_[l]);
00160             }
00161             k = 0;
00162             for (l = 0; l < nAtomType_; ++l) {
00163                for (m = l+1; m < nAtomType_; ++m) {
00164                   ++k;
00165                   dR.subtract(rCom_[l], rCom_[m]);
00166                   dRSqPair[k-1] += dR.square();
00167                }  
00168             }
00169             for (j = 0 ; j < nAtom_; j++) {
00170                typeId = moleculePtr->atom(j).typeId();
00171                dR.subtract(positions_[j], rCom_[typeId]);
00172                dRSq[typeId] += dR.square();
00173             }
00174      
00175          }
00176          k = 0;
00177          for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00178             dRSq[i] /= double(nMolecule);
00179             dRSq[i] /= double(iTypeNAtom_[i]);
00180             accumulators_[i].sample(dRSq[i]);
00181             outputFile_ << Dbl(dRSq[i]) << " ";
00182             for (j = i+1; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00183                ++k;
00184                dRSqPair[k-1] /= double(nMolecule);
00185                accumulators_[nAtomType_+k-1].sample(dRSqPair[k-1]);
00186                outputFile_ << Dbl(dRSqPair[k-1]) << " ";
00187             }
00188          }
00189          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00190       } // if isAtInterval
00191 
00192    }
00193 
00194    /*
00195    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00196    */
00197    void BlockRadiusGyration::output() 
00198    {
00199       int i, j, k; 
00200       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00201       if (accumulators_[0].nSamplePerBlock()) {
00202          outputFile_.close();
00203       }
00204 
00205       // Write parameters to file
00206       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00207       ParamComposite::writeParam(outputFile_); 
00208       outputFile_.close();
00209 
00210       // Write average to file
00211       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00212       k = 0;
00213       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00214          accumulators_[i].output(outputFile_);
00215          for (j = i+1; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00216             ++k;
00217             accumulators_[nAtomType_+k-1].output(outputFile_); 
00218             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00219             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00220          }
00221       }
00222       outputFile_.close();
00223 
00224    }

00227    * Save state to binary file archive.

00229    void BlockRadiusGyration::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00230    { ar & *this; }

00232    /*
00233    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00234    */
00235    void BlockRadiusGyration::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00236    { ar & *this; }
